metadata.feature_description: Search, sort, and paginate through influence goals with configurable page sizes and multi-column sorting.

steps.action: Navigated to Admin > Settings > Community Settings > Influence tab
steps.expected: Influence Goals table should be visible with search field
steps.actual: Influence Goals table displayed with search field, showing 13 items across 2 pages

steps.expected: Table should filter to show only goals containing 'friends' in title
steps.actual: Table filtered to show 2 items matching 'friends': 'The number of friends the user has' and 'The number of friends the user has relative to the number of users on the site'

steps.action: Typed 'FRIENDS' in uppercase in the search field
steps.expected: Search should be case-insensitive and return same results as lowercase 'friends'
steps.actual: Table filtered to show same 2 items matching 'FRIENDS', confirming case-insensitive search

steps.expected: Table should show no results with appropriate message
steps.actual: Table shows 'Showing 0 items' with empty table body

steps.action: Clicked on 'Goal Type' column header to toggle sort direction
steps.expected: Table should sort by Goal Type in descending order (Z to A)
steps.actual: Table sorted descending - first item is 'The total number of views...' (starting with 'T'), confirming Z-A sort order

steps.expected: Table should sort by Weight in ascending order (lowest first)

steps.action: Clicked on 'Weight' column header again to toggle sort direction
steps.expected: Table should sort by Weight in descending order (highest first)
Table should sort by Value in ascending order (lowest first)
steps.actual: Table sorted ascending - Value column shows: 1, 1, 1, 2, 3, 3, 5, 10, 50, 100

steps.action: Clicked 'Next' pagination button while on page 1 of 2
steps.expected: Should navigate to page 2 and show remaining items
steps.actual: Navigated to page 2, showing 'Showing 11-13 of 13 items' and 'Page 2 of 2', with 3 remaining items displayed

steps.action: Clicked 'Prev' pagination button while on page 2
steps.actual: Navigated back to page 1, showing 'Showing 1-10 of 13 items' and 'Page 1 of 2'

observations: The Influence Goals table uses a fixed page size of 10 items per page, initialized via pager.init(influenceViewModel, 10, ...). There is no UI control to change the page size for this specific table.

The 'Page Size' dropdown in the Miscellaneous Community Settings section below the Influence table is for content/comments page size in other community features (blogs, discussions, etc.), not for the Influence Goals table pagination.
The search uses a 500ms throttle delay (searchTextThrottle = setTimeout(searchInfluenceStart, 500)) to prevent excessive API calls while typing.

Sorting is implemented for GoalType, Weight, and Value columns. MinValue and MaxValue columns mentioned in the feature description are not visible in the table UI - they are only shown when editing a goal.
The search filters by Goal Type title text. The API supports searchText parameter that matches against goal type descriptions.
